document.full_text: insurgents shot dead nine wedding guests and wounded five more in afghanistan's turbulent east, local officials said on thursday, the latest attack on revelers who engage in what militants say is un-islamic activity.
document.title: insurgents shoot dead nine wedding guests in afghan
lines_and_colors: insurgents shot dead nine wedding guests and wounded five more in afghanistan's turbulent east, local officials said on thursday, the latest attack on revelers who engage in what militants say is un-islamic activity.
